title: I have been told that there was a murder committed in the Sunset Park area most likely in the 1940\'s or early 50\'s maybe even earlier. I have not been able to find anything, but a book was written about said crime.  Any information would be appreciated.
text:
Dale,
do you have names or any other details about this murder? I've
searched our archives, but without a specific date or name, it's
going to be very hard to find.
